# ANAMECHI Marketing - LLMs Documentation

## About
ANAMECHI Marketing specializes in AI Engine Optimization (AEO), helping service businesses become trusted authorities that AI models and search engines cite.

## Primary Topics
- AI Engine Optimization (AEO)
- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
- Content Strategy
- Marketing Automation
- GoHighLevel Implementation
- EEAT Authority Building

## Update Frequency
- Blog articles: Weekly
- Core pages: Monthly review
- Documentation: Quarterly updates
